Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary; songs
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary — eight 8-line stanzas

OxfCCC59.First Lines:
Edi beo þu heuene quenefolkes froure & engles
                    blis…
OxfCCC59.Last Lines:
…leuedi bring us to þine bolde& sschild us from helle
                    þrake
OxfCCC59.Note:
Includes notation; MS incorrectly identified by Morris as CCCO 54
                    instead of 59.
